name: Security Breach
description:
The city is in danger, and its your job to instruct the police on how to control the incessant hordes of zombies and rouges coming your way

Any similiaries to the real world is just a coincedence. This game's concept was created prior to the Black Lives Matter protests. Please note that I do not condone police violence, and as a consequence I added penalties for injuring peaceful protests.

If the matter is disturbing to you, viewer discrestion is advised.
